message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe you'll find valuable.  To start things off, I'm proposing a price of $16,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's the highest I can go. Can you meet me at $13,000?
